DESCRIPTION: A unique type of defensive skill, can benefit from and trigger other effects.
Soul is a unique resource the player can use to activate special Fõcus cards.
Spend that amount of Soul in order to play the card

The Antethis of Soul, Võid increases the characters võid level, which improves the damage of Võid cards, leaves the player Vulnerable and negates any Soul gathered. Võid decrements at the beginning of each turn.
Special cards that have powerful effects, Attacks with the Spell keyword do not generate any Soul

Infection is a lingering debuff that damages you and decrements at the end of your turn

Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest is to match keywords like the single word keyword.
